main.se450.singletons

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.singletons.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The singleton Class SoundManager handles and manages all the accesses to sound files that are used in the program.

    • Method Summary
